effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 100%
Use True Hero+1 (505970) at the start of a battle
Increase resistance to all elements by 15%
name: True Hero

desc_short: Nullify poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, stone, and charm, and boost fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 15%
毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化魅惑無效+提高15%火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性
독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화, 매혹 무효화+불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 당, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 15% 상승
Annule poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie, pétrification et charme, et augmente la résistance au feu, glace, foudre, eau, vent, terre, lumière et ténèbres de 15 %
Annulliert Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus, Stein sowie Bezaubern und erhöht Feuer-, Eis-, Blitz-, Wasser-, Wind-, Erd-, Licht- und Dunkelresistenz um 15%.
Anula ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf, pie y embrujo, y aumenta la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 15%
